ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Miscellaneous comments on study, interview, methodology relevant to this form data
Does the participant require a clincians assessment for risk to self/others?
Name of clinician determining risk to self/others
Participant deemed at imminent risk to self/others?
Participant requires clinical intervention to maintain safety?
Have you had thoughts of actually hurting yourself?
Have you ever attempted to harm yourself in the past?
Have you thought about how you might actually hurt yourself?
Have you thought about how you might actually hurt yourself? How?
How likely do you think it is that you will act on these thoughts about hurting yourself or ending your life sometime over the next month?
Notes: 0= Not at all likely; 1= Somewhat likely; 2= Very likely

ElementDescription: Is there anything that would prevent or keep you from harming yourself?
Is there anything that would prevent or keep you from harming yourself? What?
